description: the allow_project_net_traffic flag allows traffic from the same project in vlan mode, but in other modes it actually allows traffic from the same network.  It should be renamed to specify what it actually does.
title: allow_project_net_traffic actually allows all traffic from the same network

comments.content: the allow_project_net_traffic flag allows traffic from the same project in vlan mode, but in other modes it actually allows traffic from the same network.  It should be renamed to specify what it actually does.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
